Author: Gateway#3763
Content:
[dscrdvrsc] <Oink> I‚Äôm in the process of putting all FAQs, How-To‚Äôs and other information that can help (new) users in operating their wallets, running miners and so forth in a central place.
Presently I have my own how-to bootstrapping and the faq‚Äôs from our #faq-chosen copied and online. I‚Äôm still reviewing / renaming / editing / supplementing this info.
What I would love is others to add to, review and rectify this info too.
For now I put that info on my github, but it is my intention to put it onto the veruscoin github and finally create a full-blown help section on the veruscoin website, to reduce the risk of being overwhelmed with help requests of new users in the (hopefully near) future.
You can send your comments to me. If you want access on the repository, that can be arranged.
https://github.com/Oink70/Verus-Help-Documents
